fixes.name: Rank Category
fixes.dax_expression:
IF(
    'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Weighted Score] > 15,
    "Tier 1",
    IF(
        'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Weighted Score] > 8,
        "Tier 2",
        "Tier 3"
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF/ELSEIF/ELSE to nested DAX IF statements and mapped the [Weighted Score] reference to 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Weighted Score]. This is a row-level classification based on a calculated field, so it is implemented as a calculated column.
